Description: Up For Auction Welcome and thank you for visiting our auction! In this auction we have a B.C. Rich Virgin Custom 7 String 25 Fret Electric Guitar with a carrying case included. The guitar is used and in good condition with some wear from previous use. The item is lightly scratched and scuffed from normal handling. There is some damage on the head stock and a small chip on the bout which can be seen in images 6 and 9. The guitar is also written on with silver permanent marker and has some rust and fading on the bridge. The guitar has been tested and is in overall good playing condition. Please see photos for more details and condition. Get this item now for an awesome price here at houstonbayou! Only pictured items are included in the auction. Please examine photos before bidding, I put magnified photos on here so that you can see every detail. If you do not see something in the photos or detailed in the description as being included, do not assume it is included. Happy Bidding! :) Buyer Info: Thank you for paying for auctions as soon as possible as Ebay will open an unpaid item dispute after 2 days of not receiving payment. If for any reason you cannot leave us a 5 star rating, contact us with any issues before opening a case with eBay. We will be happy to work with you to come to a satisfactory resolution. Questions: Monday to Friday 8:30 A.M. to 4:30 P.M. CST If you are inquiring on a weekend or after hours please at least allow us until the following business day to respond to your message. Please use eBay's message system. Refunds & Returns: We try as hard as we possibly can to make our customers happy.
